= net config=
== route ==
	1. route command
		a)  default gw:
			route add default gw 128.224.162.1 netmask 0.0.0.0 
		b)  add route
			route add default gw 128.224.162.1 netmask 0.0.0.0 
		c)  del route
			route del -net 128.224.162.0  netmask 255.255.255.0 dev eth0
== waln==
	1.  wlan
		a)  Example:
			WiFi:
				# rfkill unblock wlan
				# ifconfig wlan0 up 
				# iwlist  wlan0  scanning
				# iwconfig wlan0 essid your_essid_host
				# dhclient wlan0
== bridge==
	* brctl
		1. Example
			其中一个网口收到的报文会被复制给其他网口并发送出去, 然而桥接却并不是在物理层实现的，而是在数据链路层
			其一是在编译内核里把CONFIG_BRIDGE或CONDIG_BRIDGE_MODULE编译选项打开；其二是安装brctl工具
			modprobe bridge
			brctl addbr br0
			brctl addif br0 eth0
			brctl addif br0 eth1
			ip link set br0 up
			ip addr add 10.1.1.18/16 brd + dev br0
			route add default gw 10.1.1.1 dev br0
			brctl show
